It also has a great feature set that makes it a powerful and functional presentation projector. 5 stars. Hope review was helpful. Thanks for taking the time to read it.- General Projector Specifications  (from the Owners Manual)Type of display - Poly-silicon TFT active matrix'Resolution - 1920  1080 pixels (1080p)'Lens - F=1.58 to 1.72, Focal length: 16.9 mm to 20.28 mm'Color reproduction - Full color, up to 1 billion colors'Brightness - Normal Power Consumption mode:'White light output 2200 lumens'Color light output 2200 lumens'ECO Power Consumption mode:'White light output 1500 lumens (ISO 21118 standard)Note: Color brightness (color light output) and white brightness (white light output) will vary depending on usage conditions. Color light output measured in accordance with IDMS 15.4; white light output measured in accordance with ISO 21118.Contrast ratio - 35000:1 with Dynamic color mode, Zoom = wideImage size - (in native aspect ratio) 34 inches (0.86 m) to 332 inches (8.4 m)Projection distance - (in native aspect ratio) 36 inches (0.91 m) to 431 inches (10.9 m)Projection methods - Front, rear, ceiling-mountedOptical aspect ratio (width-to-height) - 16:9Focus adjustment  - ManualZoom adjustment - ManualZoom ratio (Tele-to-Wide) - 1:1.2Internal sound system - 5 W monauralNoise level - 37 dB (Normal Power Consumption mode) or 27 dB (ECO Power Consumption mode)Keystone correction angle - Vertical:  30 (Auto keystone correction) Horizontal:  30 (Manual keystone correction)USB Type A port compatibility - One USB 1.1 and 2.0 compliant port for USB mass storage device input- Projector Lamp SpecificationsType - UHE (Ultra High Efficiency)'Power consumption - 200 W'Lamp life - Normal Power Consumption mode: Up to about 4000 hours, or ECO Power Consumption mode: Up to about 7500 hoursNote: Turn off this product when not in use to prolong the life of the projector. Lamp life will vary depending upon mode selected, environmental conditions, and usage. Brightness decreases over time.- Remote Control SpecificationsReception range 19.7 feet (6 m)'Batteries Two alkaline or manganese AA- Projector Dimension SpecificationsHeight (excluding feet) - 4.5 inches (114 mm)Width - 11.7 inches (297 mm)'Depth - 9.6 inches (245 mm)'Weight - PowerLite Home Cinema 2040: 6.4 lb (2.9 kg) , or PowerLite Home Cinema 2045: 6.8 lb (3.1 kg)- Projector Electrical SpecificationsRated frequency 50/60 Hz'Power supply 100 to 240 V AC 10%, 3.1 to 1.4 A

This is really not a bad product at all. It does come rolled up for transportation easy and compactness much like posters and some art. If you can let it relax and flatten out first you may experience better results getting it to stick on the wall.In designing a product like this there must be a balance that 3M is trying to achieve. They make many different adhesives and are know for their quality and expertise in this department. I image that they are trying to get just the perfect balance for good holding power and good removability without wall damage. The sheet is too large for their command stick series which hold great and remove great too. I guess they erred on the side of removability. So...I guess what I would do if I was placing it in a temporary location or testing a location, would be to tape it up using frog or blue masking tape. Then if or when I knew that I liked that spot peel the backing and try to stick it.If you are putting it in a permanent location and want it to stick there well, just use some 3M spray adhesive like 3M 21210 Super 77 Spray Adhesive. You will not have to worry about it lifting then.The tackiness that it comes with is mild to medium in holding power. If your wall is dusty or dirty or if you handle the adhesive and get fingerprint oils and such on it especially at the corners then it will lose its holding power. I would definitely recommend the peel the backing off as you go method of installation.Once up it works fabulously as long as it is on a hard smooth surface. Works great once installed properly. Perhaps 3M should have given better instructions and maybe even sent it out with 2 levels of adhesiveness. Thumbtacks can also make for a quick and dirty approach. Or build a frame around it. Of course you can just buy them framed. 4 stars. Hope this helps a little.

This is a pretty decent case for the Surface 3 tablet. It protects the back great. If you have or get a screen protector for the front then you covered. I think is actually almost 5 stars. I like the rubber texture on main body of the case. It adds just enough grip and softness. The bendable hinge portion does seem a little like it might eventually break, but I may be wrong and it will last a long time. It works great despite the thinness of it. It is very convenient to use, open and close. I also like the way it looks and the colors. I think 4 stars is about right.

This Sony 55" 4K Ultra HD XBR55X900C generates mixed feelings. I wall mount TV's as a part of my business and just purchased and installed the XBR55X850C one month ago. The difference between the 850 adn the 900 is significant. If you want the thinnest mounting panel available then this one of the thinnest.It has been specially designed to be a thin set that can wall mount very close to the wall. The U-shaped bracket that it comes with is designed in such a way that it hangs almost exactly like a picture in a frame would. The rear shell has been designed to ventilate heat up and out of the top of lower rear panel section. You will need to deal with the ethernet, fiber optic and component connectors if you use them on the back of the set. They will stick out past the rear case a little and add depth to your install. However if you just use the HDMI jacks on the side of the unit then the rear case can sit flush to the wall. This will give you a total installed depth of only 1-1/2". Looks wonderful. The power cord is an attached cord that originates if facing the back of the screen at the lower left corner. You can add a recessed receptacle to plug it into or fish it down and out the wall to a lower plug if it is OK to do so where you live. It is 4 feet long. I wish it was 6 feet and detachable.The are some trade-offs that this type of mounting system creates. 1st - you can not tilt the TV. So if your mounting it high and need to tilt down, it won't unless you purchase a 3rd party mount. (which you can, and I did to test this TV). 2nd - The wall bracket is only 8 inches wide which is not wide enough to span 2 studs on 16" centers or even wide enough to guarantee that it will hit on a single stud at all. The TV is pretty heavy as far as modern 55" flat panels go weighing in at approx 38.14 lbs. I like them with a little weight to them as the ultra light ones aren't usually good quality. I would make sure to anchor into at least one stud behind the bracket and shoring up the other side with some molly anchors or such. Even better would be to cut out a section of drywall and add a 2x4 cross brace.For those installations that do not require absolute thinness, then I would definitely purchase a wall mount that has a wall bracket at least 16" or better yet 24" wide and with tilt if you need it.Here is a model that I often use for a flat mount: Mount-It! MI-305B Premium Low-Profile Fixed TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32 - 60 inch LCD, LED, 4K or Plasma Flat Screen TVs - Super-strength Load Capacity 175 lbs, TV Stays 1 inch from the Wall, Max VESA 750x450 with 6 ft HDMI cableHere is one that tilts: Mount-It! MI-303B Premium Tilting TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32 - 60 inch LCD, LED, or Plasma Flat Screen TV - Super-strength Load Capacity 175 lbs - 15 Degree Tilt Mechanism Up & Down, Max VESA 700x450 with FREE 6 ft HDMI cableIf you use a 3rd party VESA compatible mount, the holes are spaced 12" apart. Also be sure to install the U-Shaped Bar even if you don't use its wall bracket it came with because it adds rigidity and well as a 3rd vertical screw hole to attach the mounting arms to. If you install mounting arms without it you can actually dent in the rear case at the screw hole. It has to have the U-shaped bar in the channel in order to not collapse it. Trust me on that!This photo is of the U-Bar.So if you are thin critical and prioritize that then this TV will satisfy. If you are a video-phile then you do not want this set yet. I was hoping that Sony was sending these out for Vine review to show that the latest serial #'s had been improved. They have not been completely fixed. There is still light bleed at the corners and edges on black, letterboxed or otherwise dark scenes. I have found that it doesn't bother me at all. It is minimal in my opinion, but it is still there. My Review Unit has a serial number sequence of 50087XX and was manufactured in Sept 2015. The light bleed is not as large an area as the earlier units but still extends a few inches into the screen from the edge.In otherwise normal scenes the picture is fantastic. Out of the box I did have to run a calibration Disc. Like a lot of others, I use Disney's WOW on Blu-ray. Disney WOW: World of Wonder [Blu-ray]. $17.29. Not the $239 six pack! From the factory it was a bit bright and thus washed out. Once calibrated it looks well, Wonderful. Hopefully Disney will be releasing a 4K version soon.The TV comes with a USB stick with some 4K content on it. I found it fun to see. The video of surfers being filmed from under water was especially interesting! Youtube has the best videos out IMO. Netflix, Vudu and Amazon look good too but not as good.The User Interface and menu system are great. The TV will want to update right out of the box and will not be usable until it does so! Once it enters into system update mode it will take approx 40 mins to complete. Factor that into your installation time.The navigation is pretty good. I would still recommend a Roku 4 or AppleTV or FireTV for ease of daily use.Once setup and dialed in this has been a splendid TV to watch. The aesthetics of it on the wall are great. It looks equally good turned off and just sitting there. The light bleed issue however can be significant. While I don't mind it in my TV routines, I would not want to have installed this in a clients project without allowing them to see and spend some time with the screen first. Bright daylight watching this would probably be fine. Night time movies... I would recommend you see it first before purchase.Hope this helps sort out some of the controversy still surrounding this 55" 4K TV.

This Invicta 21501 Men's Watch is very well built. It feels like a tank. It is heavy and substantial. You could probably hammer in 8 penny nails with it. The band is nicely done with a secure clasp. The face is nicely designed and attractive. The dials are functional albeit small and a bit hard to read, but very usable. The crown turns nice and smooth. I like the look and design. I have given this 4 stars and perhaps it is just my preference, but here is why I "like it" but did not choose the "love it" rating.I recently reviewed this watch: Lucien Piccard Men's LP-11187-02S Navona Analog Display Quartz Black Watch and it to me is a 5 star product. It sells for $82 vs. $104. It is also has ultra smooth mechanics and feel. From the back case to the front crown the fit and finish are just a bit more refined. I know they are different styles and materials involved. I just wanted to convey what a 5 star is to me. Watches tend to be very subjective, so aesthetics and materials aside, just looking at build quality I think this is a very nice watch for the price and that it is good purchase no, doubt. I like it but you may love it. It is definitely not cheaply made. 4 solid stars.

Bought this as a gift for someone who helped us with our daughter's medical condition by sharing their experience. We felt this angle holding a lantern was a nice gift from one Irish family to another.  I wish the detail was a tad better in person but it's still lovely and the price is nice for Waterford.
Our Goldendoodle puppy loves this and has loved it since the day we brought it home.
We read that Goldendoodles love this toy. Not ours. He loves the squirrels but so far doesn't enjoy finding them in the trunk. He's only 12 weeks so we'll see if he grows into it.

We bought three of these. One small, one medium for our large breed Goldendoodle puppy. The small was a joke. The medium fit him for about two weeks and now we're into an XL at 12 weeks and 22 pounds. He's a little larger than the average doodle because he was one of only 4 puppies and got all the milk he wanted. Still -- be sure you check this on your dog and afford for room to grow.

This is very old school looking and would be great for your little pirate but the black part is leather and it smells and the box smelled so much I had to wrap it in a bag right away. That worried me. It's made in China of course so not sure what to think. Otherwise it works fine.

I cannot say enough good about this gate. We don't even have it screwed into the wall -- it's just sitting on its own -- and our large breed dog (a goldendoodle that is already 22 pounds at 12 weeks and in an XL harness) jumps wildly at the gate and it stays upright and contains him. Eventually he might figure out he can push it across our wood laminate floor if he keeps at it long enough and then get out one side but he hasn't done that yet. The door opens and closes easily and it's so flexible that you can make it about any shape you can think up. We don't use it as a circular pen -- we use it to block him into the kitchen and dining area. It has been a Godsend and allowed us to give him so much space when confined as opposed to a crate. He can have the run of the kitchen and dining area and that makes us feel better about leaving him alone. Highly recommend!

This seems to work well with our Goldendoodle puppy. When I first got it everyone laughed at me because it's truly huge. They said the puppy wouldn't be able to use it for a long time. Well, he's 12 weeks now and we've only had him for four weeks and he's already big enough to eat and drink from the bowls. My only complaint in that the sticker on the one bowl is so stuck on there I can't get it off. I don't want to use chemicals to get it off so we're using one of my nice ceramic bowls for now until we find a replacement. Otherwise no complaints. keeps things contained.

These work well. My vet said this is the best way to transport a large breed puppy and dog. I watched some scary video about crates busting apart and being death traps in the car so we felt even better about this purchase.
My puppy (a Goldendoodle) doesn't seem to care too much for these. I get that "Meh" reaction from him. He cares more about his kibble as a treat than these so I won't buy them again.

Bought this for the rake to use with the GoGo stick which is a superior pooper scooper.  The rake helps with those times when the poop doesn't want to go into the bag easily. We never use the other part of this scooper --- it's  too old school.
This is a nice leash and we use it with the Puppia harness. It's a pretty color too!
This does not glide on very well. It's dry and cakey if you don't mix it with a moisturizer. It often doesn't cover as well as I'd like and ends up looking cakey. I won't buy it again.
My daughter loved these when she saw them at our nature center classes. We bought her one and she plays with it often. It's a simple toy but provides a lot of fun.

This is a nice pooper scooper.  However, I recommend you spend the money to get one of those small rakes that come with the cheapie pooper scoops and use it with this for times when you need a bit of a hand getting the mess into a bag. The stick never gets poopy which is nice.
This tasted great when my six year-old daughter opened it but it was completely shattered.
Our puppy loves these. They're easy to spot and fit his mouth even though he's a large breed puppy and the size of a medium dog right now.
This fits the crate we bought even when we had the divider in for the puppy.  It's nice and we have no complaints.

We already have a set of these but bought more for favors at my daughter's birthday party. Even though a third grader and a first grader are amoung the girls who will attend our 3 year-old's party, we know they will all enjoy these! They stay well even in my girls thick but fine hair.

Our girls went out for Halloween as Shaun and Bitzer.  We do a countdown calendar for Halloween where the Great Pumpkin brings little gifts or treats every day in October. On Halloween morning they get a bigger surprise. This year it was a plush Shaun & Bitzer and this CD. We've already watched most of it and love it. Our entire family loves Shaun the Sheep!

My six year-old has loved Max and Ruby since she was one year old and now her sister, our 2 year-old, loves it as well. We're thrilled with everything Rosemary Wells has written. The shows and the books are fantastic. Cannot say enough good about M&R!
This is nice but it's VERY LARGE. About the size of a gallon milk jug. Just FYI if you have a small car, this might not fit. We have an SUV and it's fine.

Our Goldendoodle breeder had this and our puppy (who grew HUGE almost overnight -- is now wearing a size XL harness at age 12 weeks) can tear and pull like mad on this and never get anything loose. It also gives a nice distance between your hand and the other end of the rope. Ouch!

These are a great price and a big hit with my daughter (age 6) who loves hamsters thanks to the Humphrey series of books. I'm able to use these as gifts on our countdown calendar for Halloween and Christmas since they're small and inexpensive. They have one for just about every occasion -- even her graduation from kindergarten!

This is the best kind of pellet for baby guinea pigs under 6 months of age. It's hard to find this in the pet stores and they charge more. They're not supposed to have corn kernals or seeds or any of the other stuff the pet store people try to push off on you when you don't know a guinea pig from a hamster.

These are so adorable and really stay on. We ordered a second one after my daughter misplaced her tail. She's a huge Daniel Tiger fan so we had to replace the set. Our daughter is two and these will fit for years to come because the elastic is very stretchy.
Fantastic value. Giant. Really has wow factor and the price could be double or more but it isn't and I appreciate that!

How can you NOT love Peppa the Pig? My SIL who is a few fries short of a happy meal doesn't like Peppa and I think that's because she's, well, not "right" in the head. This show has appeal to adults and children alike. It's great for a boy or a girl. It's sweet and uncomplicated and just plain funny. Both my girls, ages 2 and 6, love Peppa and George. This is a great book for fall -- all the books are wondeful and most follow the show so they're accessible for the kids.
This was really strong and overpowering.  I would not buy it again. We used it for my father-in-law's house we're trying to sell after his passing. It's enough to choke a horse.

This is very nice quality. St. Lucy is the patron saint of sight.  We bought it before our two year-old had eye surgery. We had it blessed by our priest as they annointed our daughter pre-surgery.  We keep it close and pray the prayer card that comes with it as shown.
Heard this on Pandora and liked it. It's a nice album to put you in the holiday spirit without all the pop-y kinds of tunes; something a little classier and calmer.

Daniel Tiger has been my daughter's absolute favorite character since she was a year old and she's turing three in two days. These books follow the series on PBS and that makes them really accessible to kids who watch the shows. Can't say enough good about Daniel Tiger.
These dresses are really cute and I'm sure will be a big hit this year.  They retail for more in a popular children's clothing catalog. Got one for my 2 year-old and 6 year-old.

SO we have a Goldendoodle and this dog doesn't really look like one -- it looks mostly like a standard poodle -- but it's cute and I hope my girls will enjoy these and the dog park Santa is bringing for them.

My girls LOVED this book (ages 2 and 6).  I sand the words/lyrics like they go in the song and my girls made me read it about 16 times in the first two days. They couldn't get enough of the illustrations and Mommy singing a book to them. It's such a wonderful book -- my childrens librarian mother reads this every year for her kids. It's a classic and not to be missed.
Really cute. Easy to lose so be careful! We lost one the first day!

My husband loved this grinder. He thought the grounds were perfect on every level. The problem? It's VERY easy to put back together the wrong way after cleaning and when you do that -- it's IMPOSSIBLE to correct it.  He somehow pried the part off the first time but then did it again months later and this time, no dice -- it won't budge. So, it's junk now. It's a real shame they couldn't put a colored tab or some kind of better markings to avoid this easy mistake. My husband is a pretty smart (albeit sleep deprived from kids) engineer and this goof up happened to him -- twice. $100 down the toilet for no good reason.

We were thrilled to see our breeder, Yesteryear Acres, is a contributor to this book! What a comfort! We are excited to get our precious bundle of joy but want to be ready. This book helped a great deal.
This would make a great gift. We bought it for our daughter's kindergarten graduation gift because she draws all day, every day. We knew it would help start the summer off right. No complaints here.

These are really good except I felt a bit silly when I realized I could just buy a jar of nutella and a bag of pretzels and save myself some coin. Oh well. The package is convenient for my kids. I will use small tupperware containers in the future but these are great if you buy them this way or get a jar and some pretzels.

This is just a really nice pool. It's plenty big for my 2 and 6 yr olds. It's big enough for a parent as well and yet it's small enough for tight spaces. It's easy to inflate with an electric pump. We have no complaints.
Works very well for scrubbing nails with kids. Also works well for scrubbing laundry stains! Bristles are not too hard.
Very cute and realistic. My daughter was thrilled with this. Warning -- this was a slippery slope as we ended up with two REAL pigs within a few wheeks ... I mean ... weeks. ;)
This is HUGE. We bought this for our puppy on the way and it's truly massive. Just an FYI. Cute, VERY squeaky and HUGE.

This has thick plastic hooks that go over the door. Our door would not close -- not even close -- with this. So I used it in my master bathroom instead and loaded it full of my various bottles of shampoo and hair spray and products which has worked well because it keeps them from rolling around the cabinet floor. However, the hook part slides (could use some non-slip grips) and I would not purchase it again.

I bought this for an odd reason: to make fairy dust from the tooth fairy! I sprayed a $5 bill with this stuff to make it sparkle for our daughter so she thought the tooth fairy came (this in no way defaced the bill -- you can rub it off). It was such a nice, subtle sparkle when the light hit it. It does not look flashy and cheap as real glitter does -- it just adds some shimmer. They should call it "shimmer spray". Smells good. Looks nice for special events or the tooth fairy's visits!
These are SO cute! They work  well too! My girls love them.

I purchased two of these when we sold our home and moved into a new one that needs a complete kitchen remodel that won't be happening immediately. The sellers replaced the range with an ELECTRIC COIL RANGE. I didn't even know they MADE those anymore! I had a beautiful kitchen at my last home complete with a GE Profile Induction Cooktop. I could not go back to cooking on an electric top range -- much less coils! I'd rather have a fire pit and caldron out back! So I ordered two of these and I could not be happier. They are powerful and work about 95% as well as my GE Profile Induction Cooktop did at the old house. The only difference is that they might take just a little longer to boil a large pasta-sized pot of water -- but still much faster than my mom's gas range. These are easy to move around (or store) and that makes life easy. If you need a cooktop for any reason, these are the way to go. Love them. Love the price. I speak from experience using an induction cooktop for six years.

This is smaller than I expected and we bought the large one. I know, I know -- the dimensions are there. But the rainbow is smaller than I tought. It is also bubbling up in a few places which could be from repositioning a million times to get it right. Nobody could get this straigt on the first try. It's unweildy due to its curved nature. It's no different than any other wall sticker -- I did not notice any different texture etc.
Really pretty shower curtain. Nice material -- not the thick cheap plastic stuff. Our girls love it.

This is very hard to reach if you're short and I would not recommend it for kids old enough to shower alone. I am unable to put the hand sprayer back up on the hook -- my husband has to do it. It's also very hard to reach the controls on the main shower head and the one to switch between sprayer and main head. I'm five foot one. I realize some of this may be related to how high your shower plumbing is but my guess is that this would be hard for most shorter people. Beyond this, the box came without instructions of any kind. Thankfully it's all pretty self explanatory but it would have made us feel better to know we were doing the install correctly. Three stars for the lack of instructions and the hook for the hand sprayer being set so far back behind the main head that it's hard to reach along with controls being set high.

Great if your kids will leave them alone. My 6 year-old spends her time in the backseat peeling it up and now it won't lay smooth anymore so I can't open the window for fear it will get caught. My two year-old doesn't touch it. This is smaller by a good deal than my Ford Edge rear windows so sun reaches their arms and legs & they complain when the sun is really hot. I wish it was larger. The area it does cover shades well and does not really obstruct view. I might buy this again if they have a larger one and just work on keeping my 6 year-old away from it.

This has been a great case. I've been meaning to upgrade to a 6Plus but just haven't gotten around to it. I needed a new case and didn't want to spend a lot. This case has been great -- better than my Otterbox. My only word of caution is that I have to make sure the batterey charger is pushed all the way in because a few times I tought it was -- but it wasn't. No big deal -- just something to keep an eye on. I would buy from this company again. I get lots of compliments on the case.

This set is so durable. We are staying at my mom's while waiting for our house to be ready to move into and her table had to be stored so we could fit all our stuff in her house. We adults can eat holding a plate but the kids were on the floor. So we got this table for them so they'd have a place to eat and my kindergartener would have a work space. The table get LOADS of use every day. The girls rock back on the chairs and stand on them and my 6 year-old even sits on the table (for a few seconds before I bark at her to get down) and it is still going strong. The top wipes down easily and is in good condition even after the use scissors and pencils etc. I cannot recommend this table more. It was assembled in the box -- all I had to do was open the legs and set up the chairs. I figured we would trash this before leaving my mom's but we realize it will stand the test of time so it will find a place in the new house. Great item. Well made.

This comforter is AWESOME! We bought one from Company Kids for more money when my 6 year-old was a toddler and this Astra one is MUCH niceer. It's perfect for my 2.5 year-old because it's heavy enough that it doesn't easily come off. Of course she finds her way out of it at night but it's nice and fluffy so she snuggles back into it during the night. It easily washes in my mom's large capacity washer (not extra large capacity) as we're staying her until our new house is ready to move into. We would buy from this company again in a heartbeat. Do not even hesitate -- this is a high quality item.

These are HARD AS ROCKS. I could not eat them because they were like eating a handful of gravel. They actually fractured a tooth and now I'm having pain and discomfort. I have to see the dentist in a couple days and probably get a root canal or something. If you have dental work of any kind, or just value your teeth and don't want problems -- stay far away from these. If you want cinnamon sugar pretzels make them yourself with other brands of pretzels by tossing them with melted butter and cinnamon sugar.  Or, go to Auntie Annie's and get a soft one. Everyone in my family found these to be ridiculously hard. I wouldn't even let my 2.5 year-old have one because I feared she would choke. Aside from that, I wasn't even all that thrilled with the flavor. Won't buy again and tossed out the bag.

These books hooked my kindergartener who has devoured them. She reads these in under a week during the school year. I'm thrilled with any series that keeps her reading and on the edge of her seat for the next book in the series. Bravo. Long live Humphrey!

THIS IS THE BOMB!!!!!!!! I am so thrilled to find this stuff. It's only 18 carbs for an entire can and they're HUGE!!! If you want something other than water and if you're a tea drinker as I am, this is as good as it gets on the fly. I buy it by the case now. I'm not a fan of the lemon one as much -- it's too sharp for me -- but the peach and the blueberry pom is wonderful as well.
This is really cute on my two year-old. It fits nicely even though she's short for her age. It will look great with her navy and white easter dress.

SO PRETTY!!! These do run smallish -- I have to really pull it down on my 6 year-old's head. However, it fits. And now my 2yr old and my 6 yr old will have matching hats to go with their navy and white Easter dresses, white shoes, short white gloves & navy trench coats. My only complaint is that the seller charged me $7 for shipping FOR EACH HAT when I ordered two. They gave a super lame-o reason for not combining shipping so I'll never buy from them again. The hat weighs like nothing. Just beware seller takes advantage.

This is SUCH a cute dress!!! It flares out a bit from the lining under it so it's just darling. My two year-old fit in the 2T well and she's short for her age. She'll wear it to match her older sister's navy dress and they'll both wear navy trenchs, short/wrist length gloves, white shoes and navy and white hats. Having little girls is so much fun!

This is super cute and very nice quality. Size 7 Fit my 6 year-old daughter well with a little room to grow. Wearing it with short/wrist length white gloves, white shoes, navy trench coat and navy & white hat for Easter.
OMG. This is the best series. Ever. Seriously -- ever. Got Showtime just so I could binge watch Season 4. Utterly addicted.
Very nice spatula. Great for crumbling meat and cooking in your good stainless cookware. Sturdy feeling as well.

These are really nice as bibs too -- protects the entire outfit and has elastic sinched cuffs. We use them on our two year-old and they work well. Will serve us well for years just as my older daughter's crayola one did. Cannot go wrong here.

Sent these in as a class gift for my daughter's kindergarten class on her birthday.  These are larger than you'd think and they smell GREAT! The kids loved them. My mom is a librarian and does childrens programming. She was so impressed with these she plans to get them for the kids in her library programs.

Brought these in as a treat for my daughter's kindergarten class when I was volunteering there recently. They went nuts over them! I just had to remind them before passing them out NOT TO EAT THEM and then correct a few kids as they lick them anyway. :)

This is my second set of these.  I love them so much. They're the perfect spatulas. Nice heavier weight, great for all sorts of cooking. Wonderful for scrambling eggs etc. and also for cookie batter or other things. Really nice.

Used these at my daughter's 6th birthday ice skating party so we could keep track of the girls on the ice & know who was with the party.  They are SO pretty and SUPER easy to velcro together. The gold was very popular. The girls adored these. Don't hesitate to get these -- they're wonderful.

These worked very well and were nice quality.  I used them on black heart-shaped card stock with a swirled super ball inserted in it to look like a planet. I put two of these stickers on it to make it clear it was a space theme & used a metallic sharpie to write "Valentine You're Out of this World!".

This is very pretty and you can see your cards easily. However -- it only fits so much. If you have cash -- forget it. The clasp will not stay closed. If you drop this, your cards wil be everywhere. You have to decide what works best for you I guess. I'm using it daily right now but have to use a separate coin purse to hold cash. Not sure I will keep it up.

0:44 MinsThe RFID blocking sleeves are really a big topic of discussion lately. I know these work because if I put a credit card in and swipe it across the front it won't read it till I take the credit card out and swipe. This company has done something really creative by allowing us to have custom made sleeves with photos of our choosing. I love that! Have a look at my video to see what I got. I rather wish I had used a few more photos now for more variety. But I highly recommend these. Amazon disclosure: I received this item for free in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own.

0:33 MinsThis string or cording is very cool! It really does glow in the dark and I've discovered the glow lasts longer if it sits in the sun versus holding it to a lightbulb or flashlight. It's nice to use in crafting or for play such as I did (see video). I did need to burn/melt the ends as I cut with scissors and then because there are inner strands under the outer color I used a lighter to burn and melt it so it wouldn't unravel or seperate. Amazon disclosure: I received this item for free in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own

0:49 MinsI really thought this would be great in my kitchen to have the spices I use most close at hand. I did have hopes that the stand itself could be attached to the wall but alas it can only be stood up long ways, short ways or laid flat. I saw something similar to this at Ikea but this one has some better features such as the lid can be twisted to allow you to shake the spice out from the side versus opening it completely. I do love the clear tops to see what spice is inside and if I'm running low. I also love the oversized strong magnet that holds it in place. Amazon disclosure: I received this item at discount in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own

0:44 MinsI'd give this 10 stars. OMG not only does our kitten love chasing the mouse but so does our dog! The green plastic circular box contains the mouse that spins easily with each frantic paw that tries to get at it. Now my dog did manage to get the mouse and we had to take the toy away and put it up higher so he wouldn't destroy it since it is the cats. Initially I wondered if an electronic moving mouse would be better but after testing this out I have to say this is perfect. Amazon disclosure: I received this item at discount in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own

1:03 MinsI think this is so pretty and such a good idea to lift your dog if needed or to attach to the car seat when traveling. However the XL size would not even zipper around my 25 lb dog. So based on that I'd suggest this XL size for a 10 to 15 lb dog or one that is smaller around it's chest. The material is beautiful chinese print on one side and mesh on the inside. The handle is adjustable in length and sturdy. Amazon disclosure: I received this item at discount in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own

While I love this idea of some interactive fun with pets and it works (shoots) treats out nicely our pets didn't understand this at all. In fact one was scared by the sound of it "shooting" and took off to hide. As for the remaining pets they couldn't find the treats that were shot out- they shoot out quickly and they couldn't track the treats easily. Also we used tiny treats and I think larger ones will be easier to see and find.  I still have to say I love it though because over time I think they will catch on. Our grandkids asked if we'd shoot kid treats (aka candy) for them to find and I imagine it would work, lol. All in all depending on your pet this can be awesome fun! Amazon disclosure: I received this item at discount in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own

0:06 MinsOverall nicely made leggings with emoji on them. Please note they are not appropriate for kids or teens due to the pills and flipping off emoji. They are shiny slick spandex fabric with stitching done nicely. They fit propely as long as you order a few sizes up from your normal usa size. This is the xl and fits like a usa medium/large. Amazon disclosure: I received this item for free in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own

0:49 MinsThese are the CUTEST socks- they are THICK and WARM and CUTE! They feel like wool but are actually 75% cotton, 20% polyester, and 5% spandex. They have the right amount of stretch and don't appear to shrink in the wash which is great. They come in an assortment of pastels too with coordinating colors on each pair. My daughter saw my socks and said she wanted some too so ha now I know what to get her for Christmas! These sets of 5 are easily a great gift. Amazon disclosure: I received this item for free in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own

These are the CUTEST socks- I LOVE Owls and these are SWEET! They have the right amount of stretch and don't appear to shrink in the wash which is great. They are not overly thick nor too thin so they are perfect for all seasons. They come in an assortment of colors which really work for me.  If you have an owl lover let me assure you- she will love these socks! I want more, more more!  Amazon disclosure: I received this item for free in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own

0:20 MinsHere is another nice little unit for those on a budget- great for kidsI I did have trouble figuring this one out- like the on/off button stumped me.This unit is blue in color and rectangular in shape and very thin so it fits nicely in your hand and can be tossed in a purse or tote. This unit includes the actual MP3 player, ear buds, and usb cable.  It does have 8GB memory but you can add a micro SD-card so plenty of space in this unit for music and movies.Amazon disclosure: I received this item for free in exchange for my unbiased review. All words and photos here are my own.

0:34 MinsThis is a nice little unit for those on a budget- great for kidsI I like that I can watch videos on it as well as tunes.This unit is blue in color and rectangular in shape and very thin so it fits nicely in your hand and can be tossed in a purse or tote. This unit includes the actual MP3 player, ear buds, usb cable, and directions that yes are in english.  It does have 16GB memory but you can add a micro SD-card so plenty of space in this unit for music and movies.Amazon disclosure: I received this item for free in exchange for my unbiased review. 0:19 MinsI was pleased with this skinny card case because it is great for the minimalist which is what I am. I tend to want to only carry my ID, a credit card, a bit of cash and my phone. So this is the kind of thing every one that doesn't like to carry alot needs. I think the leather is nice and has a good looking grain to it, nice stitching and fits nicely in my hand. Then we have the price to consider and bravo- it's an excellent price making this a good value. Amazon required disclaimer: I received this product free to sample and review. My review is my own opinion and all words are my own.

0:52 MinsI've had this skillet pan for a few days now and love it. I've made eggs in it and was worried the eggs would stick down in the bumps but they didn't- they literally slid off. Tonight we had steaks and again- easy peasy and amazing. One thing though- be sure to season it! It's in the directions included so don't overlook that step. One of the cool bonus features is that this skillet comes with protection in the form of a felt pad that sits inside it if you like to stack your pans. They do say this is a scratch resistant pan but the key word is resistant so be safe. I love the non-stick coating pans and this one is 100% PTFE and PFOA Free so that's the best part to non-sticks. And ceramic is the best of the non-sticks. This one is not only green for the paint color but has won a green earth award- love that. Amazon required disclaimer: I received this product free to sample and review. My review is my own opinion and all words are my own.

0:29 MinsThis watch combines my favorite two things in watches- leather and wood! It has a nice supple leather band that yes, smells like leather, however the black band does have some dye issues because my husbands wrist was discolored after wearing it. I'd suggest some kind of cleaning of the leather or spraying with a sealer. The face of the watch is surrounded by bamboo wood. It's one of the best looks I've seen and looks great with a casual look that I love. The watch is a Quartz which makes it even better. My husband loves these and wants them all. Such a great collection by IDEASHOP!Amazon required disclaimer: I received this product at discount to sample and review. My review is my own opinion and all words are my own.
